page.title: 06SHOPPING IN SHREWSBURY.
page.content: We found that most people we questioned went shopping in{Shrewsbury more than once a week, and the rest roughly once a fortnight.The most popular shops seem to be the multi-purpose shops which sell a variety of products e.g.{Marks and {Spencers.}There is no doubt,however, that of the shops which sell only one product there were more{clothes {shops}than any other. The majority of people we asked, payed by cash,with few paying by cheque. Only one person out of twenty payed by credit card. A lot of people walked to town with a few going by car. The bus service to town is good but few people used it.{Shrewsbury}is generally quite good for shopping with a wide variety of retail outlets.
